contentSequences.description: Horizontal row of 8 quick link buttons with icons: Rate plans, Phones & devices, Offers, Pay bill online, Coverage map, Check eligibility, Mission-critical, FirstNet Refer-A-Friend

sections.name: Hero
sections.styling: dark background with hero image of first responder, white text

contentSequences.description: Eyebrow text 'MISSION-CRITICAL COMMUNICATIONS', main heading 'America's first responder network', description about 2.99 million square miles of coverage, and primary CTA button 'Check eligibility'
Section heading 'Discounts for first responders' with subheading 'Switch to FirstNet and take advantage of special offers available'

Grid of 3 promotional offer cards: 1) Apple Watch SE 3 and iPad for $0.99/mo each with iPhone 17 purchase, 2) $800/line to break your contract, 3) FirstNet & Family - Families save 25% on AT&T lines. Each card has image, eyebrow, heading, description, legal text, and CTA
Section heading 'Why FirstNet for 5G public safety' with subheading 'Built from the ground up to support emergency services'

Grid of 3 feature items with icons: 1) 'Enough capacity for every first responder' - dedicated lane for public safety, 2) 'The largest network for public safety' - First Priority, speed, 5G, 3) 'Unprecedented accountability' - public-private partnership
Primary CTA button 'Learn more' and legal disclaimer about 5G coverage
Section heading 'Latest news from public safety's network'

Grid of 3 news article cards: 1) 'Introducing FirstNet Fusion' (PRODUCT LAUNCH), 2) 'Stress relief for emergency physicians' (HEALTH AND WELLNESS), 3) 'Town of Duck keeps residents safe' (LAW ENFORCEMENT). Each has image, category tag, title, description, and 'Read more' link
Arrow link 'Explore more from the FirstNet community' pointing to /community.html
Centered heading 'Connect with a FirstNet specialist' with primary CTA button 'Contact us'
Left column: Heading 'LEARN ABOUT AMERICA'S PUBLIC SAFETY NETWORK', subheading 'Get connected', legal text about email consent
Right column: Email input field, dropdown for category (Law Enforcement, Fire, EMS, Emergency Communications, Other Public Safety), Submit button

local.purpose: List of features with icons and descriptions
